remarks: Value of the point inversion function ` S ` .  Definition 7.5 of [Schwabhauser] p. 49.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-May-2019.)
statement:
mirval.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
mirval.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
mirval.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
mirval.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
mirval.s $e |- S = ( pInvG ` G ) $.
mirval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
mirval.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
mirval $p |- ( ph -> ( S ` A ) = ( y e. P |-> ( iota_ z e. P ( ( A .- z ) = ( A .- y ) /\ A e. ( z I y ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d .- y z $.
$d A y z $.
$d G y z $.
$d I y z $.
$d P y z $.
$d ph y z $.
